iati-activity.title: Toke Kutaye and Babich Town WASH project
iati-activity.description: This project will reach people in three wards of the Oromia Region in central Ethiopia who have the poorest rates of access to water and sanitation. As well as delivering access to water, sanitation and hygiene, this project will improve water source protection, food production and income generation. This in turn will contribute to poverty reduction and the sustainable development of the communities. The project will serve 24,507 users in water supply, 22,920 users in sanitation and 18,465 in hygiene in the target area.
